metadata.Title: CVE-2013-0722 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Stack-based buffer overflow in the scan_load_hosts function in ec_scan.c in Ettercap 0.7.5.1 and earlier might allow local users to gain privileges via a Trojan horse hosts list containing a long line.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2013-0722` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

ettercap-common - 1:0.8.2-2build1
ettercap-graphical - 1:0.8.2-2build1
ettercap-text-only - 1:0.8.2-2build1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ettercap package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:0.8.2-2build1').
